name: GhostBlaster
description:
3d Unity Game made for COMP 376 - Concordia University

Requirements

Windows

Installation Instructions

1. Download the project files

2. Unzip to your computer

3. Launch the .exe

Controls

WASD - Player Movement

Mouse - Camera Movement

Left Mouse Button - Shoot Laser

C - First/Third Person Camera Toggle

F - Flashlight (scares bats away)

ESC - Pause the game
